name: Hazard Perception Free UK 2020
description: Practice ALL 20 clips from the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank for the new style test, now live throughout the UK.  FULL VERSION: This is the FULL version with all questions and functionality not just a taster.  Completely up to date for the 2020 Hazard Perception Test.  We have helped over 1 million learners prepare for their tests.   Key Features **************** * Practice 20 clips from The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency revision question bank - the people who set the test. * Receive immediate feedback after each clip to fin out how well you scored * Review each clip to find out where the hazard started and where maximum points could have been achieved. * Gain experience across a wide range of road conditions. * Progress Monitor to keep track of how well you are doing  ***************************  Essential training for:  - Learner car Drivers - Learner Motorcyclists - Trainer LGV Drivers - PCV Drivers - ADIs and PDIs  ***************************  Yes, there are ads  this allows us to offer the app for free! If you prefer no ads, simply upgrade.
